tweets.name: Rex Parker
tweets.text: No sleep til Brooklyn! OK, some sleep ... but not a full 8 hrs a night! #CrosswordRebel #ACPT #2MoreWeeks

tweets.name: NYTimesWordplay
tweets.text: Only 125 hours left until the tribe gathers at ACPT! Who's excited?! Tweet to me @NYTimesWordplay #crossword #nytimescrossword

tweets.name: Rex Parker
tweets.text: If I didn't make any errors on Puzzle 7, I should win the New York State/Westchester division. Big, big “IF” ... #acpt

tweets.name: Andrew Feist
tweets.text: C finalists: 3 Aaron Wilson 2 Jeff Davidson 1 Benjamin Coe #ACPT

tweets.name: Ken Stern
tweets.text: Under 2 mins for Tyler to finish, which may be tough.  Upper left, hardest corner. #ACPT
